name: Son Depremler
description: - Haritada grntleme yaplabilir.  - Son 24 saat deprem verileri.  - Son 7 gn deprem verileri.  - Son 30 gn deprem verileri.  - Depremin iddetine gre sralama yaplabilir.  - Tm veriler Boazii niversitesi Kandilli Rasathanesi ve Deprem Aratrma Enstits Blgesel Deprem-Tsunami zleme Ve Deerlendirme Merkezi tarafndan salanmaktadr. - The display can be made on the map.  - Past 24 hours earthquake data.  - Last 7 days earthquake data.  - Last 30 days earthquake data.  - it can be sorted according to the severity of the earthquake.  - All data Bogazici University Kandilli Observatory Earthquake-Tsunami is provided by the Regional Monitoring and Evaluation Center.
